questions.question: Which hyperparameter configuration could result in an underfit model?
options: A gradient descent algorithm configuration with too many epochs
A decision tree model trained with a maximum depth hyperparameter that is too low
A neural network model trained with a number of layers hyperparameter set too high
A neural network model trained with a number of neurons in each layer hyperparameter set too high
correct_answers: A decision tree model trained with a maximum depth hyperparameter that is too low
